cards.question: Who built this flashcard app?
cards.answer: Ben Green - a developer who believes learning should be free (but coffee shouldn't be) ☕

cards.question: Why did Ben make this app?
cards.answer: Because paying $50+ for flashcard apps is highway robbery! Also, he likes building cool stuff 🚀

cards.question: How can I support this project?
cards.answer: PayPal donations, GitHub stars, or just tell your friends! Word of mouth > paid ads 📢

cards.question: Will this app always be free?
cards.answer: Yes! Open source and free forever. Check it out on GitHub: BenjoGreeno/flash-cards 🆓

cards.question: Can I contribute flashcards?
cards.answer: Absolutely! Fork the repo, add your JSON files, and submit a PR. Community-driven learning! 🤝
